item.title: Matching Strategies in Python
item.description: Matching and Filtering Strings RegEx (Regular Expression) can be used to search for patterns within a string. This is useful in a variety of contexts, such as matching IP addresses, websites, and nucleotide bases as just a few examples. In the following string (from Homework 11), I am going to match all of the website addresses. import re string6="<http://www.classmates.com/go/e/200988231/CC123101BT/CM00> <http://graphics.classmates.com/graphics/spacer.gif> <http://graphics.classmates.com/graphics/sp \ You have received this email because the requester specified you as their Manager.
